name: UNSTABLE NHP

actions.detail:
Your Mech gains the AI tag; however, this NHP doesn’t count towards the number of AIs you may have installed at once. Your mech gains Memetic Spark.
Memetic Spark:
1/Round as a Quick Action you may deal 1 AP Energy damage to a character within Range 3. It deals +1 damage for each NHP installed on your mech including this one. "NHPs" are Systems that grant your Mech the AI tag and that are capable of cascading or can be allowed to cascade.

description:
[i slumber but yearn to awaken].
Gained from the Iconoclast: Rank I pilot talent.

name: COCKPIT INTEGRATED STIM PUMP
effect: You may expend a charge to activate this system as a Protocol. If you, do you may pick any number of the following stims and apply their effects. Roll 1d6 for each, if any two dice show the same result you immediately become Stunned until the end of your current turn instead of applying the effects. All stim effects last until the start of your next turn.

actions.name: Agitron
actions.detail:
You become Impaired.
You gain Immunity to Shredded.
Your Melee attacks gain Knockback 1. If this causes a character to collide with an Obstruction, they take 2 Kinetic damage.

actions.name: Enduritran
actions.detail:
You become Jammed.
You gain Immunity to Impaired.
Your armor increases by 2, this may bring you above 4 Armor.

actions.name: JUICE
actions.detail:
You become Slowed.
You gain Immunity to Jammed.
Your next attack this turn gains +1 Accuracy.

actions.name: Nerve Boosters
actions.detail:
You become Shredded.
You gain Immunity to Slowed.
You ignore Engagement and your movements do not trigger Reactions.

description: Powerful Stim pumps directly wired into the cockpit and intravenously administering the pilot with a potent slew of drugs. While able to enhance a given pilot’s combat ability to superhuman levels, the user should be keenly aware of the substance’s various side effects. While the aperture is theoretically capable of mixing and administering complex drug cocktails this should be done with extreme caution, as the wrong mixtures or doses may lead to sudden cardiac arrest, requiring resuscitation of the pilot via in-built defibrillators and an injection of “Adrenadron” to purge their system.

name: MESMERTRANCE DAMPENER
effect: 1/Scene when targeted by a Tech attack you may give that attack +1 Difficulty as a Reaction. You gain Immunity to the MesmerTrance environmental effect.
description: Handed to you by the Talons, the MesmerTrance Dampener supposedly stops the highly advanced and aggressive virus “MesmerTrance” from affecting your mech. As a side effect It also provides limited protection against other, less sophisticated, attacks on your mech’s systems.
